Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Troy in 1971...
Injured on 5/20/1972 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/19/1973 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/25/1973 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Released by Troy on 11/3/1976...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 11/3/1976 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1977, off Anthony Hawks (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1977, off Nick Saez (SHP)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Plum Grove on 9/2/1978...
Traded from Bay City to New Jersey on 7/7/1980 (Going to NJ: CF J. Castilla. Going to BC: P G. Brito, C W. Armenta, 3B B. Austin)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1980, hitting .632 with 1 HR, 1 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Manchester on 4/1/1981...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1982, hitting .577 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/3/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $1,800,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/7/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $660,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Northeastern on 9/20/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 3/1/1988 to a minor league contract.
